numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.
Visual approaches are not authorized with GPWS inoperative. Instrument approach procedures must be used.

note.para: For operations to Central, South American and Mexico destinations ONLY, the flight may not depart outbound domestic gateways with an inoperative Ground Proximity Warning System, but may continue series of flights for repair interval specified in the Repair Int Category section.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "GND PROX SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
